title: Why does getting into the Alpha client take so long?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe another wave of applicants were recently accepted into the testing, if you're still yet to be accepted I would recommend waiting it out for a while longer, or waiting until the client is ready to enter the public testing phase (RC).

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EEtKmi2u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T07:46:09.620+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> I believe another wave of applicants were recently accepted into the testing, if you're still yet to be accepted I would recommend waiting it out for a while longer, or waiting until the client is ready to enter the public testing phase (RC).

okay thanks, i think i will just wait for the RC. It looks so cool  
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
